text_block_list.text:
Today is the start of the "summer 
training camp" - a training program 
to improve our skills.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You over there! Promptly get your
belongings to your room, please!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You there, we'll talk later! 
First, we must greet the workers at the 
facility!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You, too, get to your room as soon as 
possi―

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ―ooh, if it isn't Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Be careful, I was almost about to show 
you to your room by mistake!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course I am!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
When it comes to the camp, it's the
class president's time to shine!
Guiding, supervision, patrolling, et
cetera.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, so busy, so busy! 
It's hard work being an honors student!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I'll be able to do both
flawlessly――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaaahh!! 
You over there, what are you up to!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You are not allowed to go to the beach
yet! I won't let you through without
permission!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Um……Then, can I have permission to go 
to the beach?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha! 
You're asking me for permission!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's just how reliable I am. 
Then, there's only one answer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I grant you permission!!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Arrghhh! 
Sakura Bakushin O, what the hell do you 
think you're doing!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Teacher! Did you see that!? Wasn't that
a splendid decision on my part!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
From now on, you can call me, "class 
teacher president" if you like!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: What the hell are you talking about!?

And so began the… fiery? Summer training 
camp with Sakura Bakushin O.
